title: Add application-level rate limiting
description: Register and configure @fastify/rate-limit in packages/cli app, make settings configurable via env/AppOptions and add tests to verify limits and bypass toggles.

implementation.notes: In-memory rate limiter registered in app.onRequest with configurable max and timeWindow. Tests added to verify blocking behavior.

acceptanceCriteria: Requests exceeding RATE_LIMIT_MAX within RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW receive 429, env toggle RATE_LIMIT_ENABLED=false disables enforcement, and unit tests demonstrate enforcement and disable behavior.
